comment: I don't usually write reviews on items I purchase from Amazon, but I was quite disappointed with this cologne purchase from Amazon. I purchased this item a few months ago for my son because he really love this cologne. After a few use and traveling with the bottle, it started leaking and the labeling started peeling. He also complained that the scent doesn't last long. I have various cologne from different manufacturers and I can tell the original scent by how long the smell stays on your clothes..I am greatly disappointed and won't be buying any more fragrance from amazon..

The scent from this cologne lasts all of ten minutes. I do not believe this to be an  authentic Dolce and Gabbana product. If I could return it I would. Very disappointed in Amazon for offering something of such poor quality. Will buy from a reputable store in the future. Big waste of money. And they get one star because it's required to submit a review. I would like to add that Amazon stood behind their sale and provided a full refund.

Lamento no poder dar mi opinión sobre este producto, lo pedí para el cumpleaños de mi marido y todavía no ha llegado, que debo hacer?  Será que llegará para su próximo cumpleaños en el 2020. Lástima no poder dar una buena opinión de este.GraciasEspero pronta respuesta.

Like everyone else says. When you first spray it on you think its the real scent but after 5 minutes.. Its gone.Even if it was a EDT it would last for an hour but this says its a EDP, it should last for a good 3 to 4 hours.The real PROOF is when you go to RETURN IT. What a surprise you cant return it. I don't think ill ever order a fragrance from AMAZON again.I encourage you not to spend your hard earned money on this product
Title says it all, buy at your own risk.
I don’t believe this is original
This is clearly a fake, bottle looks good and scent is almost there but longevity wise and the intensity of the scent is not legit.
It’s probably not original, I’m pretty disappointed in amazon for this one. Good packaging everything looks authentic but na
hola quiero saber donde esta mi paquete no me a llegado dise entregado el 23 julio en miami pero domex no lo tiene ?
THE ORIGINAL PLASTIC WAS OPEN AND THE BOX WAS USED
